summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RM-ID Subject Matter (Ledger Thread) linking system for OMNIGOVAULT. All backend API endpoints are working correctly including subject creation, auto-suggest, atomic subnumber allocation, and governance record linking. Fixed critical routing issue in suggest endpoint. Frontend authentication protection working properly.
passed_tests: GET /api/rm/subjects returns subjects for a portfolio with proper filtering
POST /api/rm/subjects creates new subject with allocated group number 1-99
GET /api/rm/subjects/suggest returns exact_match, suggestions, or should_create_new
GET /api/rm/subjects/{id}/preview returns next RM-ID without allocating
POST /api/governance/v2/records with rm_subject_id links to existing subject
POST /api/governance/v2/records with create_new_subject=true spawns new thread
Concurrent subnumber allocations do not create duplicates (atomic operations verified)
LedgerThreadSelector component exists and is properly integrated in governance create modals
Frontend loads correctly with no errors
Navigation works properly (Governance link navigates to #governance)
Authentication protection works (protected routes redirect to login)
All 94 backend API tests passed including comprehensive RM Subject functionality

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All RM Subject API endpoints working correctly, atomic operations verified
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - Authentication protection working, cannot test full LedgerThreadSelector UI without login credentials
